keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart Fish-Man Island
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates officially depart Fish-Man Island, sailing upward through the ocean toward the New World as residents gather to wave goodbye.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the conclusion of the Fish-Man Island arc and the crew's transition to the New World.

description: An underwater island located 10,000 meters below sea level, beneath the Red Line. Home to fish-men and merfolk.

keyEvents.title: Madame Sharley Destroys Her Crystal Ball
keyEvents.description: At the Mermaid Cafe, Madame Sharley's shattered crystal ball lies on the floor after she deliberately broke it.
keyEvents.significance: Symbolizes Sharley's hope that her prophecy about Luffy destroying Fish-Man Island won't come true.

description: A cafe on Fish-Man Island run by Madame Sharley, known for its mermaid waitresses and fortune-telling services.

keyEvents.title: Shirahoshi's Pinky Promise
keyEvents.description: Shirahoshi swims up to the Thousand Sunny to make a pinky promise with Luffy and the crew before their departure.
keyEvents.significance: A touching farewell moment that establishes a future promise between the crew and Shirahoshi.

keyEvents.title: Departure from Fish-Man Island
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny sets sail from Fish-Man Island, heading upward through the ocean toward the New World.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the ship's departure from Fish-Man Island and entry into New World waters.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' second ship, built by Franky with wood from the legendary Adam Tree.
